std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Gordon Lewis Smith"
Source: Grahamstown - St George (Anglican), Grahamstown, Baptism register, 1869-1908, page 186, entry number 4836. Repository: Cory Library, MS 14 878-4. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite and proof read by Sue Mackay as part of the eGGSA Project, from photographs by William Jervois
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with gordon lewis anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Gordon Lewis Smith baptism on 13 Oct (born 17 Sep 1907), son of James Lewis Smith & Emily May Smith.

std_narrative.citation:
Gordon, son of James Lewis Smith & Emily May Smith, was born on 17 September 1907 and baptised on 13 Oct. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Gordon Lewis Smith"
Source: Grahamstown - St George (Anglican), Grahamstown, Baptism register, 1869-1908, page 186, entry number 4836. Repository: Cory Library, MS 14 878-4. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite and proof read by Sue Mackay as part of the eGGSA Project, from photographs by William Jervois
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Child with smith anywhere in the surname with gordon lewis anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Gordon Lewis Smith baptism on 13 Oct (born 17 Sep 1907), son of James Lewis Smith & Emily May Smith.
